name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supermeet- Meeting scheduler powered by GPT-4

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your time and availabilities to propose meetings personally & conversationally.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Schedule meetings faster with AI based proposals.

Features:

ðŸ“† Setup one-off & team meeting availabilities:

No meeting type limitations. Create unlimited events or meetings. Share them anywhere using supermeet chrome extension without being rude to anyone.

ðŸ”¥ Set priority slots for priority meetings:

Take control on your time, productivity and prioritise it for the meetings that matters the most. Never worry about too many cold/low priority meetings taking away your time.


ðŸ˜Ž Use loom videos to intro and pitch before the meeting:

Build a rapport before meeting by giving personal intro and more information about the meeting upfront. This helps to qualify cold leads. Sometimes you can just use a pre-recorded demo video to avoid un-necessary meetings!

ðŸ’¬ Propose the best time conversationally:

Don't just show all your availabilities to get spammed or over loaded with too many cold meetings. Propose the right time as per the guest using conversational AI powered by GPT-4


For any help: support@supermeet.ai
